text: The Irish Water Spaniel (Spáinnéar Uisce in Irish) is a breed of gundog of the spaniel type. They were developed in Ireland in the 1800's to fetch birds that had been shot at over lakes and rivers. They are one of the biggest spaniels. ==Colour== They are always a dark brown colour called liver with very curly hair. ==Temper== They make good pets as they have a pleasant nature and are very smart, but sometimes they do not like being around other dogs. ==References== Category:Spaniels Category:FCI breeds Category:Dog breeds originating in Ireland Category:Rare dog breeds
title: Irish Water Spaniel
